name: Aim Trainer (Jovan Jankovic)
description:
Perfect your aiming with Aim Trainer!

Aim Trainer is a small game/program which you can use to better your aim. You can customize the training session in the Customize menu, to match your preferences. At the end of each round, you will be shown some statistics about your performance.

This is a small project of mine made over a weekend. I hope you enjoy it!
